comment: This file contains the metadata for tests. IMPORTANT: *DO NOT* change the uuid values

tests.name: Phosphate in Mehlich (Quantofix)
tests.calibration: Standards are prepared by diluting 100 ppm phosphate stock solution with Mehlich solution. 100 ppm Stock solution is prepared by dissolving 0.1454 gm of Anhydrous KH2PO4 in 1000 ml of distilled water.

tests.name: Nitrate-N and Nitrite-N in Mehlich (Hach)
tests.calibration: Standards are prepared by diluting 100 ppm Nitrate-N stock solution With Mehlich solution. 100 ppm Stock solution is prepared by dissolving 0.7218 gm of dried KNO3 in 1000 ml of distilled water. Preserve with 2 ml of CHCl3/L of solution.

tests.name: Soil - Available Nitrogen
tests.description: Measures nitrate and nitrite in water. Nitrate 0 - 50 ppm, Nitrite 0 - 3.0 ppm

tests.name: Soil - pH
tests.calibration: 16 Dec 2016 using X-Rite i1Pro 2, Reagecon Buffer solutions Exp. Date: 28-06-2016

tests.name: Water - Arsenic (0 - 4000)
tests.description: Measures arsenic levels. This is a dual range test kit - choose this test when the 0-4000 ppm range is used.

tests.name: Water - Arsenic (0 - 500)
tests.description: Measures arsenic levels. This is a dual range test kit - choose this test when the 0-500 ppm range is used.

tests.name: Water - Free Chlorine
tests.description: Measures Free chlorine in water. 0 - 1 ppm

tests.name: Water - Free Chlorine - 2
tests.description: Measures Free chlorine in water. 0 - 3 ppm

tests.name: Water - Nitrate & Nitrite
tests.description: Measures nitrate and nitrite in water. Nitrate 0 - 500 ppm, Nitrite 0 - 80 ppm
tests.calibration: 04 May 2017 using X-Rite i1Pro 2, Nitrate Standards are prepared by diluting 1000 ppm Nitrate stock solution. 1000 ppm Stock solution is prepared by dissolving 1.6306 gm of dried KNO3 in 1000 ml of distilled water. Preserve with 2 ml of CHCl3/L of solution. Nitrite Standards are prepared by diluting 500 ppm Nitrite stock solution. 1000 ppm Stock solution is prepared by dissolving 0.7499 gm of dried NaNO2 in 1000 ml of distilled water. Preserve with 2 ml of CHCl3/L of solution.

tests.name: Water - Nitrate - N & Nitrite - N
tests.description: Measures nitrate and nitrite in water. Nitrate 0 - 50 ppm, Nitrite 0 - 3.0 ppm

tests.name: Water - pH
tests.calibration: 16 Dec 2016 using X-Rite i1Pro 2, Reagecon Buffer solutions Exp. Date: 28-06-2016

tests.name: Water - Potassium
tests.calibration: 30-03-2017 using X-Rite i1Pro 2. Standards are prepared by diluting 2000 ppm Potassium stock solution. 2000 ppm Stock solution is prepared by dissolving 3.8135 gm of KCl in 1000 ml of distilled water.

tests.name: Water - Total & Free Chlorine
tests.description: Measures chlorine and free chlorine in water. 0 - 10 ppm
